Necross/ Splattercannon:
 
Splattercannopn jumps from his hiding spot and opens fire with his beam gatling gun.  When it overheats, he switches over to his beam cannons, firing them as the gatling cools.
 
Necross lazily looks to the firefight with moderate interest.  He raises his right arm and fires a volley of missiles at the Maximals.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackFang/BlackNigtmare/DarkFate/NightStrike::

"Where do you meet him?" asked the young bot when with out knew it 
he walked towards a trap.

BlackNightmare yelled "OPEN FIRE!!!! NOW!!!!

Soem shot fallen near BlackFang who ran to cover himself and open 
his comlink to maximals, yelling to Cryaltron and his fellows to 
base "ALERT!!!!!! THE ENEMY HAVE SET US A TRAP!!!! UNICRON'S 
MINIONS ARE HERE!!!!"

"Souls!  Give your strength!  Give me your power!  Strike your revenge with Omni- Savior Slash!" -Victortegon the Angel of Darkness' Destruction
